Optional description text to display below the label `hint` `string` - Optional hint text to display below the OTP input `error` `string` - Error message to display (typically from Zod validation) `required` `boolean` `false` Whether the field is required `pending` `boolean` `false` Whether the field is in a loading/pending state `variant` `'default' \| 'pill'` `'default'` Input variant `coloredBorder` `boolean` `false` Whether to show a colored border (only applies to pill variant) `length` `number` `6` Length of the OTP code `mask` `boolean` `false` Whether to mask the input (like a password) `maskChar` `string` `'•'` Character to display when input is masked `separator` `boolean` `false` Whether to render with a separator between groups `groupSize` `number` `3` Size of each group of digits `autoSubmit` `boolean` `false` Whether to automatically submit the form when OTP is completed
